definition: festival/holiday/node/joint/section/segment/part/to economize/to save/to abridge/moral integrity/classifier for segments, e.g. lessons, train wagons, biblical verses/CL:個|个[ge4]
see 節骨眼|节骨眼[jie1 gu5 yan3]

sentences.english: After Pentecost, the activity is now pre- eminently the work of the Holy Spirit.
sentences.chinese: 五旬節以後，這工作主要是聖靈的工作。

sentences.english: But I will tarry at Ephesus until Pentecost.
sentences.chinese: 但我仍要在厄弗所逗留到五旬節。

sentences.english: Land diving, Vanuatu. "The land divers of Pentecost are the fore-runners of modern bungy jumping."
sentences.chinese: 五旬節的陸上跳水員是現代跳水運動的先驅。
